citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:40 pm on
31-JUL-19.
I was able to make contact with the Licensee's Wife. She stated that the Licensee was not available for inspection
at that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:40 pm on
31-JUL-19.
I was able to make contact with the Licensee's Wife.  She stated that the Licensee was not available for inspection
at that time.
